title: Best of 2021...So Far
description:
It's vacation week at Barstool Sports so there is no new episode today but there is a new episode of Answer the Internet! After almost a year hiatus, ATI is back and better than ever featuring Dan Soder and Shane Gillis. Download the app and subscribe to the youtube to catch the latest videos. barstool.link/ATI In the meantime, catch up on some of our favorite segments from the past six months, and let us know your favorites by tweeting at us. @KFCRadio @KFCBarstool @Feitsbarstool @nickhammy5 @JNics415


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
